description: Hook for decoding an ini string to a dict.

help.description: A string to display when calling with the `help` argument.
help.title: Help

render_by_default.description: A list of string fields to wrap with jinja braces and render by default.
render_by_default.title: Render By Default

render_exclude.description: A list of field names to not render.
render_exclude.title: Render Exclude

is_public.description: A boolean if hook is public / callable from outside the provider).
is_public.title: Is Public

skip_output.description: A flag to skip the output and not set the key. Can also be set within a hook call.
skip_output.title: Skip Output

kwargs.description: A field name of type dict to map additional arguments to.
kwargs.title: Kwargs

data.description: Yaml string to convert to dict.
data.title: Data

title: IniEncodeHook

description:
Hook for reading and writing ini files. Hook reads from `path` if no `data` field is
 provided, otherwise it writes the `data` to `path`.

help.description: A string to display when calling with the `help` argument.
help.title: Help

render_by_default.description: A list of string fields to wrap with jinja braces and render by default.
render_by_default.title: Render By Default

render_exclude.description: A list of field names to not render.
render_exclude.title: Render Exclude

is_public.description: A boolean if hook is public / callable from outside the provider).
is_public.title: Is Public

skip_output.description: A flag to skip the output and not set the key. Can also be set within a hook call.
skip_output.title: Skip Output

kwargs.description: A field name of type dict to map additional arguments to.
kwargs.title: Kwargs

path.description: The file path to put read or write to.
path.title: Path

data.description: Map or renderable string to a map key to write. Must have three levels for the section, key, and value - ie {section:{key1:value1, key2:value2}}.
data.title: Data

allow_no_value.description: Whether to allow a no values.
allow_no_value.title: Allow No Value

title: IniHook
